subject: Update documentation (JSDoc preambles)
description:
**Type:** Task (after review implementation)

**Description:** Update JSDoc preamble comments in jest.*.ts files that reference `"jest.base.ts"` in inheritance chain descriptions (change to `"jest.base"`). Check README for CDK prepare script references.

**Skills to Invoke:** `/jsdoc-best-practices`, `/coding-philosophy`

**Verification:** Preambles match actual import paths

learnings: JSDoc preambles reference file names (jest.base.ts) not import paths. Since we kept .ts extensions in Jest imports, the preambles are accurate. No updates needed.
